name: Operation Alone
description:
After an experiment went wrong all city was infected by a virus. But only one man survived from it. Now he will stop at nothing to save his people from this virus.

You have to play as the character who survived the attack. Go through the sewer tunnels, lock all the lids and go to the lab to release the gas that cures the infected people.

Controls

Movement: WASD
Aim: Mouse
Shoot: Left Mouse Button
Reload: R
Lock lid: Space
Minimap: M

Special thanks to

Mixamo & free3D.com for the 3D models
Freesound.org for the sounds

Installation process

Extract the Operation Alone.zip file and Run the Operation Alone.exe.
